messages.title: What This Election Is About
messages.content: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest with Theresa May and John Glen - or weak and unstable coalition government led by Jeremy Corbyn.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Ensures stability for business and a reformed immigration system.
Fairer funding with no Salisbury school seeing its budget cut as a result.
Increasing NHS spending by £8 billion above inflation.

issues.brexitEurope: A mainstream Brexit that ensures stability for business and a reformed immigration system.
issues.education: £4 billion more for our schools and fairer funding with no Salisbury school seeing its budget cut as a result.
issues.governance: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
issues.health: Increasing NHS spending by £8 billion above inflation.
issues.immigration: A mainstream Brexit that ensures a reformed immigration system.
issues.socialWelfare: Increase pensions and ensure social care is affordable for all - including a cap on costs.

community.content: John grew up in Wiltshire and has been Salisbury's MP for seven years - he works hard to secure jobs, investment and high quality local public services.

leaflet.personalStatement: Over the last seven years, we have made real progress restoring our economy. The deficit has been cut by two-thirds and we are the fastest growing economy in the G7, but there is more to be done.

politicalExperience.achievements: Proven to be a strong voice, able to influence decisions in Westminster for the people of Salisbury.

images.caption: Strong and stable leadership in the national interest
Working hard for the people of Salisbury and South Wiltshire

examples: Increasing NHS spending by £8 billion above inflation.
Boost the schools budget by an extra £4 billion.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
John grew up in Wiltshire and has been Salisbury's MP for seven years.
Strong and stable leadership in the national interest.
Increasing NHS spending by £8 billion above inflation.
